line_1: Hark how he sweeps the strings! — such tones
New-strung the Nerves, and strain'd their slacken'd Tones,
line_2: But when just Time has set th' unjoynted Bones,

line_1: While the meek father, listening to their tones,
line_2: Swell'd the full cadence of the grief by groans.

line_1: Some sing of love with soft expiring tones,
line_2: White bosomed nymphs around with loosened zones

line_1: With sweet responsive sympathy of tones;
line_2: Whose finer sense each soft vibration owns

line_1: Her soft embraces, and endearing tones,
line_2: With sparkling eye the blameless Plunderer owns
While o'er the Harp pale Misery moans,
Still louder shrieks, and heavier groans!
